name: Halloween Coin
description:
***Thank you for your support!! We will strive to keep updating the game to make it BETTER!!***

★★★★★ - "thank you for making this game for the holiday, very nice graphics. love it so much."

★★★★★ - "It's almost like being in the arcade only it's a lot cheaper in the long run. It's fun and really addicting."

★★★★★ - "...I've already played for an hour straight to be able to say its really addicting..."

Welcome to our Halloween Party!

Trick or Treat? Watch my coins! Collect all the prizes!

Bet your best luck, collect them all.

Come celebrate Halloween with the lovely future witch and the cute ghost!

***Halloween Coin Special Features***
• Simple and easy to pick up and play!
• Get the most out of your Halloween: Jack-o-lanterns, coffins, witches, ghosts,and more!
• Exciting gaming: drop your coins on the coffin, the lovely witch & the cute ghost will get you lots of holiday treats!
• Happy surprises or scary tricks, come check it out for yourself!
